text: Shiwakhanyoola Abandu basuubila Nyasaye nende inyanga imalilishi, nibayanzanga balia abaloba Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe tawe, kata nibakhaba basaabwe, nohomba Abana baabu, nohomba Abasiani babu nohomba Abakhasi babu. Abo Nyasaye yara mumioyo chiabu obusuubili, ne nabahelesia amani ka roho akhurula khuye. Ne alibenjisia mwikulu mumikunda chiburangamwo emialo, balimenyamwo tsinyanga tsiosi, Nyasaye yabafuchilila nabo nibamufuchilila, Abo nibo bomukanda kwa Nyasaye. koo toto bwene omukanda kwa Nyasaye niko kulishila
